summary.para: Specifies options that can be applied when a layer resource is applied to create a layer.
summary.div: Note Starting in Windows 8, the D2D1_LAYER_OPTIONS_INITIALIZE_FOR_CLEARTYPE option is no longer supported. See for Windows 8 layer options.

member.name: D2D1_LAYER_OPTIONS.D2D1_LAYER_OPTIONS_NONE
member.summary: The text in this layer does not use ClearType antialiasing.

member.name: D2D1_LAYER_OPTIONS.D2D1_LAYER_OPTIONS_INITIALIZE_FOR_CLEARTYPE
member.summary: The layer renders correctly for ClearType text. If the render target is set to ClearType, the layer continues to render ClearType. If the render target is set to ClearType and this option is not specified, the render target will be set to render gray-scale until the layer is popped. The caller can override this default by calling while within the layer. This flag is slightly slower than the default.
